backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging using OutCalls and Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two marquee‑related features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of concise summaries for many frontend source files and their roles in the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes describing a frontend TypeScript build failure caused by browser‑incompatible Node.js typings in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a fallback recovery UI if React fails to mount.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts for Mawalking Radio.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching, aggressive cache cleanup, asset prefetching, and push notification handling.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script to detect issues before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that checks for NodeJS.Timeout usage, runs TypeScript checks, and validates asset paths before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with routing, playback state, lifecycle handlers, and an error boundary for UI recovery.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting and provides UI feedback with analytics tracking.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompts and platform‑specific install guides with dismissal logic.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a bottom navigation bar with Home, Shows, and Settings tabs and handles tab switching.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact music player with album art, scrolling title, play/pause control, and navigation to the full player.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Provides an auto-scrolling marquee for long track titles with pause and accessibility handling.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Controls and syncs audio element volume using a slider component.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel to enable and display status of push notification subscriptions with error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Modal form for submitting song or shoutout requests with validation and async submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting the user to refresh or reset when a service worker update or load error occurs.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using the Web Share API with a fallback dialog for copying a shareable link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays a show’s image, details, genres, and schedule in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red LIVE badge with pulsing indicator and radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Renders a small pulsing dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays customizable track notifications with icons, styling, and an optional dismiss button based on notification type.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Provides mock show data and the Show interface for development use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Restores audio playback after visibility, focus, or bfcache lifecycle events and triggers manual resume when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast API initialization, session handling, and casting state for a given stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Tracks and toggles a single favorite station flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Calculates overflow-based marquee animation properties by measuring container and text widths.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Determines when to show browser notifications for track, mix, or live changes with deduplication and permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles push notification subscription lifecycle using a service worker and backend storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the stream URL with fallback logic, checking stream availability, fetching now playing data, and submitting requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset operations, and related state via a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a sleep timer that counts down and pauses audio when time expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing the screen wake lock based on playback activity and page visibility.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, background assets, responsive background behavior, and global layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of mock shows with genre and day filters and navigates to selected shows.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: UI for the live home screen showing station header, now-playing info, and a dynamic play/pause button with loading and error states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays expanded now‑playing view with album art, track info, playback controls, volume slider, and sleep timer options.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page with push notification controls, background‑image cache refresh logic, and general about information.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Show details screen displaying show metadata, schedule, image, and actions like downloading an ICS calendar event.
Startup diagnostics collector that logs early script/resource errors and displays a recovery overlay if critical issues occur.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility wrapper for safe Google Analytics event tracking, providing helpers for playback and casting events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a show by computing the next occurrence and downloading it as a blob.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs, enforcing HTTPS and resolving relative or malformed inputs to absolute URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, breakpoints, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing context, known issues, and existing feature requests for fixing marquee scrolling.
